name: Mahjong 3D Solitaire Mini
description:
Thank you for viewing！Thank you for downloading！This is a fun 3D game, another great puzzle game of Zhongyuan Mahjong series.


Youtube Demo:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=08t32tQSYOM&feature=youtu.be


-----------------------------------------------
***** You must find out identical side-by-side connecting tiles and remove them as quickly as possible.
***** You can rotate 3D cubes.
***** Almost every puzzle is solvable but requires strategic methods.
***** One of strategic methods: After game starts, lock 8 or more connecting pairs.

-----------------------------------------------
Others:
*It supports Chinese, English, Japanese and Traditional Chinese, French, German, Italian, Dutch, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian and Swedish.
*It supports leaderboard of Game Center with completion times and best score.
*It supports local leadearboard of best time.
